title: Acceleration of ball thrown from asteroid

content.description: A ball is tossed straight up from the surface of a small, spherical asteroid with no atmosphere. The ball rises to a height equal to the asteroid's radius and then falls straight down toward the surface of the asteroid.
content.question: The acceleration of the ball at the top of its path is

choices.label: at its maximum value for the ball's flight
equal to the acceleration at the surface of the asteroid
equal to one-half the acceleration at the surface of the asteroid
equal to one-fourth the acceleration at the surface of the asteroid

content.answer: equal to one-fourth the acceleration at the surface of the asteroid

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
